item.title: The best podcasts I listened
item.description: This post is an archive of the podcasts I have liked for the sheer brilliance of the interviewee. This post will be updated as I listen more. Note: The order of appearance does not indicate any preference. Machine Learning Joins with Arun Kumar Cruise: Self-Driving Engineering with Mo Elshenawy Kubernetes Vision with Joe Beda Envoy, with Matt Klein Future of Computing with John Hennessy Holiday Repeat
